item.description:
Body Mind Systems, a comprehensive martial arts system with a school in Stoneham, Massachusetts, invites you, your colleagues and family to our Martial Arts Boot Camp Week starting Monday February 21, 2011 through Saturday February 26, 2011.  Adults (Ages 15 and older) are welcome to participate in any of the adult classes for free, compliments of the school. 

 

Adult classes are held weekdays from 7:00 PM – 8:00 PM and Saturdays 11:00 AM – 12:00 PM.  See website for additional school schedule.  No prior experience is necessary.  Reservations are recommended as space is limited. Visit www.bodymindsystems.com or contact us at 781-279-1400 or at bob.lee@bodymindsystems.com.

 

 

We look forward to seeing you soon.

Who is right for the training? The entrepreneur, business owner, manager, consultant or professional who values a strong mind and body to ensure success in business, at home and in the community. Everyone wants a martial arts lifestyle because it’s about being a healthy, strong, harmonious human being.

  Kind regards,   Bob Lee Assistant Head Instructor 3rd Degree Black Belt www.bodymindsystems.com

group.name: Boston/North Shore Martial Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Martial Arts Boot Camp Week (February 21-26, 2011)
